org.anchoranalysis.plugin.mpp.segment.bean.optimization.termination

Class UnchangedBase

  • Object
    • AnchorBean<TerminationCondition>
      • TerminationCondition
        • NumberIterationsBase
          • UnchangedBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnchangedScore, UnchangedSize

    public abstract class UnchangedBase
extends NumberIterationsBase
    Parent class for TerminationCondition that rely on some attribute remaining unchanged for a certain number of iterations.
    Author:
    Owen Feehan

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: TerminationCondition
        Called before TerminationCondition.continueFurther(int, double, int, org.anchoranalysis.core.log.MessageLogger) once to setup state in the bean.

        If called again, it resets the current state.

        Specified by:
        init in class TerminationCondition

      • continueFurther

        public boolean continueFurther(int iteration,
                               double score,
                               int size,
                               MessageLogger logger)
        Description copied from class: TerminationCondition
        Whether to continue for an additional iteration step or not.
        Specified by:
        continueFurther in class TerminationCondition
        Parameters:
        iteration - the current iteration of the optimization.
        score - the current score associated with the optimization
        size - the current size associated with the optimization.
        logger - a logger to write messages to
        Returns:
        true iff a continuation should occur.
